member.name: T:OpenCore.Common.Address
member.summary: Class Address models a physical street address.

member.name: M:OpenCore.Common.Address.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor is the base initializer for the class.

summary.value: The name of the City.
The properties of the Country
The internal Identifier of the address.

The Latitude property represents the geographic coordinate that specifies the north-south position of the address. If City, Country, PostalCode, Subdivision, and StreetAddress are not provided, then Latitude and Longitude are required.

The Longitude property represents the geographic coordinate that specifies the east-west position of the address. If City, Country, PostalCode, Subdivision, and StreetAddress are not provided, then Latitude and Longitude are required.
The PostalCode of the address.
The properties of the Subdivision.
The StreetAddress property represents the number and street name of the address.
The StreetAddressAdditional property represents street location information in addition to StreetAddress.
The properties of the TimeZone.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Address.UnLocode
member.summary: The UnLocode property represents the official UN LOCODE value of the address

member.name: T:OpenCore.Common.Country
member.summary: Class Country models a country.

member.name: M:OpenCore.Common.Country.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This constructor initializes the new country with the given IsoNumeric and Name params. The IsoNumeric property is automatically applied as the Identifier property of the country.
member.param: IsoNumeric is the ISO 3166-1 numeric code of the country.
Name is the ISO 3166-1 English short name for the country.
CallingCode is the ITU-T E.123/E.164 international prefix code for the country.
IsoThreeCode is the ISO 3166-1 three character code of the country.
IsoTwoCode is the ISO 3166-1 two character code of the country.

member.name: M:OpenCore.Common.Country.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This constructor initializes the new country with the given Identifier, IsoNumeric, and Name params.
member.param: Identifier is the internal identifier of the country.
IsoNumeric is the ISO 3166-1 numeric code of the country.
Name is the ISO 3166-1 English short name for the country.
CallingCode is the ITU-T E.123/E.164 international prefix code for the country.
IsoThreeCode is the ISO 3166-1 three character code of the country.
IsoTwoCode is the ISO 3166-1 two character code of the country.

member.name: M:OpenCore.Common.Country.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: This constructor initializes the new country with only the Identifier when quick constructs are required for entities that will be referenced in a database in a later action.
member.param: Identifier is the internal identifier of the country.

summary.value: The CallingCode property represents the ITU-T E.123/E.164 international prefix code for the country.
The Identifier property represents the internal identifier of the country. This identifier is not necessarily the same value as the IsoNumeric code.
The IsoThreeCode property defines the ISO 3166-1 three character code of the country.
The IsoTwoCode property defines the ISO 3166-1 two character code of the country.
The IsoNumeric property defines the ISO 3166-1 numeric code of the country.
The Name property defines the ISO 3166-1 English short name for the country.

member.name: T:OpenCore.Common.Currency
member.summary: Class Currency models a currency using ISO 4217 specifications.

member.name: M:OpenCore.Common.Currency.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor is the base initializer for the class.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Currency.CountriesInUse
member.summary: The CountriesInUse property represents a list of countries where the currency is in active use.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Currency.DigitsAfterDecimal
member.summary: The DigitsAfterDecimal property represents the number of digits after the decimal when using the currency. Default is TWO (2).

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Currency.Identifier
member.summary: The Identifier property represents the internal identifier of the currency.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Currency.IsoCode
member.summary: The IsoCode property represents the ISO character code of the currency - including cryptocurrencies.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Currency.IsoNumeric
member.summary: The IsoNumeric property represents the ISO numeric identifier of the currency.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Currency.Name
member.summary: The Name property represents the common name of the currency.

member.name: T:OpenCore.Common.Reference
member.summary: Class Reference models referential key/value data for an object.

member.name: M:OpenCore.Common.Reference.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor is the base initializer for the class.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Reference.Key
member.summary: The Key property represents the key or qualifier for the reference.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.Reference.Value
member.summary: The Value property represents the value of the reference.

member.name: T:OpenCore.Common.Subdivision

member.summary: The Abbreviation property represents the commonly accepted abbreviation of the subdivision.

member.name: T:OpenCore.Common.TimeZone
member.summary: Class TimeZone models the complexities of a time zone.

member.name: M:OpenCore.Common.TimeZone.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor is the base initializer for the class.

summary.value: The Abbreviation property represents the common abbreviation for the time zone, if applicable.
The Canonical property represents the canonical time zone name as defined by the IANA time zone database.
The Identifier property represents the internal identifier of the time zone.
The MilitaryTimeZone property represents the US Military/Nautical time zone abbreviation.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.TimeZone.Name
member.summary: The Name property represents the common name of the time zone, which differs from the Canonical. Central Time which canonically is America/Chicago

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.TimeZone.ObservesDaylightSaving
member.summary: The ObservesDaylightSaving property represents whether or not the time zone is a daylight saving zone.

member.name: P:OpenCore.Common.TimeZone.UtcOffset
member.summary: The UtcOffset property represents the offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
